value.name: Four family members charged with murder in a case that police say resulted from mistaken identity
value.description: Four members of one Texas family are accused of killing a Houston-area man who they believed had vandalized their home and vehicles, according to the Harris County Sheriff's Office.

value.name: Texas teen, family members allegedly chased down and shot a neighbor in case of mistaken identity
value.description: Eddie Clark, 29, was fatally shot after a Texas family mistook his car for a vehicle they believed belonged to someone they had a dispute with, police said.

value.name: Texas family charged with murder after chasing down a mistakenly identified man
value.description: In an incident that deputies call a “tragic case of mistaken identity,” four family members have been charged with murder after the family allegedly chased down and shot 29-year-old Eddie Clark near his home in Harris County,

value.name: Texas family killed an innocent man while chasing down a suspected vandal, police say
value.description: Four family members are facing murder charges after being accused of shooting and killing a neighbor they suspected vandalized their home.

value.name: Texas family kill innocent neighbour while hunting for teen vandal, police say

value.description: Eddie Clark, 29, was fatally shot after a Texas family mistook his car for a vehicle they believed belonged to someone they had a dispute with, police said.

value.name: Four Family Members Allegedly Killed a Man for Vandalizing Their Home Over and Over. It Was Actually the Wrong Guy.
value.description: Eddie Reece Clark III, 29, was shot in his midsection. And he had never before met the family or otherwise interacted with them or any of their belongings. The post Four Family Members Allegedly Killed a Man for Vandalizing Their Home Over and Over.

value.name: Surveillance Video Shows Entire Family Surround Car and Shoot Man Inside
value.description: A surveillance video captured the moment when a family in suburban enclave of Houston, Texas, blocked in a car with their two vehicles before firing gunshots that killed a man. The four family members have all been charged in the murder,

value.name: Texas Family Targeting Vandal Allegedly Killed Innocent Neighbor in Case of Mistaken Identity
value.description: Four Texas family members are accused of ambushing and fatally shooting a neighbor in what appears to be a case of mistaken identity.  The Harris County Sheriff's Office said the family appeared to be looking for a teen who they thought was responsible for damaging their home and vehicles.
